description:
Key Qualifications

  • 5-7+ years of technical product management. Strong preference for experience building or scaling platform technologies.
  • Strong technical acumen to take projects from start to finish using product delivery, workflow and deployment tools effectively.
  • Agile or other continuous feedback used for informing and validating implementation strategies.
  • Able to work with cross-functional teams and deeply understand engineering problems and deliver detailed specifications.
  • Deep understanding of complex web application architecture, with the ability to deliver large cross-functional projects on time and with high quality.
  • Advanced SQL skills and experience with Python is preferred.
  • Interested in consumer process with experience in consumer or B2B2C product management.
  • Metrics driven with the ability to gather both qualitative and quantitative data.
  • Successful building of products or businesses from scratch.
  • Experience launching and/or growing products beyond a pilot phase.
  • Experience in enterprise software, financial software or other.
  • Experience working with third-party systems or building API-driven platforms.

To see new and updated job postings and job postings similar to this, please follow us on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/summithr

Job Posted by ApplicantPro
